name: EleBot
description:
Our little robot wakes up after a long sleep. Now, he’s alone in his space base. Outside he will find that nothing is as he remembers. He will propose to restore his home. 

He must get the 4 elements: earth, water, air and fire at any cost. Through the portals in his world, you will be able to access to the 4 worlds. In there you must have to solve the different, fun and complex puzzles on the course to the world's element.

Once retrieved an element, the robot's world will be, slightly, brought to life. Bit by bit he will recover the home he longs for.

Control multiple robots at the same time and solve fun puzzles! Solving puzzles requires the use of one, two and even three robots consecutively. If you jump, or move, all the robots will at the same time.

Help the little robot with his clones to relive his desert and lonely world. From a forest, passing through an aquatic, an aerial world, even reaching the final world of fire, you should get all the four elements.

Explore varied and original worlds of Low Poly Art. Each of the four levels will provide you an element to restore the balance of yours. Provide to your basement plant, water, air and fire, and see how it changes.

Discover a wide variety of mechanics. Tricky puzzles controlled by one, two or three characters at the same time are located all around the four worlds. Each level will have unique gameplay and mechanics.
